detail_desc: Cap in cotton corduroy with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Cap in a cotton weave with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Short, straight-cut sleeveless dress in a denim-look weave made from a cotton blend with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back.
Leggings in ribbed jersey with an elasticated waist. The leggings are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Leggings in ribbed jersey with an elasticated waist. The leggings are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Small shoulder bag in soft imitation suede with fringing on one side, a zip at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with press-studs at one end to adjust the strap length. Lined. Size 1x15x18.5 cm.
Briefs in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Briefs in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Straight-cut coat in woven fabric with notch lapels, a button at the front and side pockets with a decorative flap and button. Unlined.
Straight-cut coat in woven fabric with notch lapels, a button at the front and side pockets with a decorative flap and button. Unlined.

Soft, non-wired push-up bra in ribbed microfibre with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide hem and no fasteners. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.

Trousers in imitation suede with a high, elasticated waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Decorative welt front pockets and slim legs with a slit at the hems.
Short, A-line skirt in a sturdy, textured weave with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Satin inner skirt.

Lightly padded parka in cotton twill with a pile-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Small, zipped chest pocket, flap front pockets with a button, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Adjustable tab and press-stud at the cuffs, a single back vent, and a drawstring at the hem. Partly lined in pile.
Santa costume in fleece with long sleeves, press-studs at the back and a matching Santa hat.
Santa costume in fleece with long sleeves, press-studs at the back and a matching Santa hat.
Slightly shorter hooded top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a cut-off, raw-edge hem.
Tube scarf in a soft knit.
Tube scarf in a soft knit.
Santa hat in a soft knit with a pompom on top. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with frill trims around the neckline and armholes.
Fancy dress costume in glossy, patterned velour with long sleeves, long legs and a deep neckline at the back.

Fancy dress costume with a lace body and a sewn-in flared skirt in tulle. Body with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, padded cups, a zip at the back and support panels at the front, back and sides. Lower section in glossy jersey and a skirt that ties with satin ribbons at the back.

Long-sleeved circus costume in soft velour with a V-neck, concealed zip at the back and fringed epaulettes. Glittery elastication at the cuffs, decorative buttons at the front and a peplum that divides at the back.

Knee-length dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a square neckline, elastication at the top and a smocked bodice. Short, elasticated raglan sleeves. Unlined.
